title: Service-Learning Design for Sustainable University-Community Partnerships

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Data analysis and project-based learning environments utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three solutions to community problems using mathematical modeling.
Learners can analyze stakeholder requirements with 80% accuracy when designing service-learning partnerships.
Learners can quantitatively and qualitatively evaluate partnership outcomes using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
